DOC.brief_title: Folate Metabolism Normal Weight Obese Women Child-bearing Age
DOC.detailed_description: Current recommendation establish 1998 , specify woman capable become pregnant consume 400 microgram folate daily supplement , fortify food , , addition consume food folate vary diet . Despite recommendation , obese woman low folate status woman normal weight suggests obesity may negative impact folate metabolism . Therefore , objective study determine difference metabolic response single dose folate normal weight obese woman child bear age . The two group woman give currently recommended amount folic acid , 400 microgram , blood sample take vitamin give various point afterwards determine serum folate response folate dose . Results research help determine folate requirement high obese non-obese woman . The long-term goal follow-up study generate data contribute evidence base use scientific advisory panel determine whether dietary folate intake recommendation base body weight .
DOC.criteria: Female 1835 yr Caucasian Body mass index 18.5 24.9 > 30 kg/m2 Currently pregnant , pregnancy within past 12 month Greater 2 previous pregnancy Use prescription drug oral contraceptive Chronic disease ( diabetes , hypertension , epilepsy , cancer , kidney disease , cardiovascular disease ) Acute illness ( e.g . pneumonia , urinary tract infection , mononucleosis ) Use antibiotic past 30 day Current smoker Use dietary supplement include multivitamin past 30 day Significant weight change past 12 month Typical alcohol consumption 2 drink per day Consumption alcohol week precede test
